entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianFenGuardsmenDescription
entry.value: Light infantry focussed on scouting and harassing the enemy. Smaller squad size, but faster, more accurate, and can more easily demolish enemy machines.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianFenGuardsmenFlavor
entry.value: After years of trekking through mud while soaking wet, even the typical Drookian Fen Guardsman can scout through land like butter.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianStormtrooperDescription
entry.value: Elite light infantry. Weaker, but packs a much greater punch than the Guardsmen.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianStormtrooperFlavor
entry.value: With enough firepower, a routine ambush can turn into a decimated enemy division.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianScoutDescription
entry.value: Light infantry with greater emphasis on scouting and harassment.
